statements: SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations;
SELECT service_name, location FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE location='New York';
SELECT location, service_name FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE service_name='VPN';
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM NetworkConfigurations;
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT service_name, configuration->>'network_type' AS network_type FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE service_name = 'ServiceA'
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE configuration->>'bandwidth' > '100'
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM NetworkConfigurations ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_configurations FROM NetworkConfigurations
SELECT service_id, service_name, location, configuration FROM network_configurations WHERE service_id = 1
SELECT service_name, location FROM network_configurations WHERE location = 'US'
SELECT service_name, location, configuration FROM network_configurations WHERE configuration->>'version' = 'v1.0'
SELECT * FROM network_configurations ORDER BY service_name DESC
SELECT location_name, region FROM locations
SELECT service_name, location FROM network_configurations
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE service_id = 1
SELECT service_name, configuration->>'hostname' as hostname FROM network_configurations WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY region DESC, location_name ASC
SELECT service_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM network_configurations GROUP BY service_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM services;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM services WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, address, city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, service_name, configuration FROM network_configurations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, location_name FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM services WHERE service_type = 'Database';
SELECT location_name, address, city FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT id, service_name, configuration FROM network_configurations WHERE location_name = 'Data Center';
SELECT service_name, service_type, description FROM services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT service_name, location FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 5;
SELECT service_name, location FROM network_configurations WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, service_name, configuration_data FROM network_configurations WHERE service_name LIKE 'Service%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM service_locations WHERE country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT service_name, location FROM network_configurations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT DISTINCT service_name FROM network_configurations WHERE configuration_data->'$.version' = '1.0';
SELECT * FROM service_providers WHERE email NOT LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT service_name, location, provider_name FROM network_configurations INNER JOIN service_providers ON network_configurations.id = service_providers.id ORDER BY network_configurations.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations;
SELECT id, service_name, location FROM network_configurations WHERE service_type = 'Router';
SELECT location, service_name FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 2;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM network_services ORDER BY service_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM network_services WHERE service_type = 'VPN' ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_configurations WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND service_name LIKE '%Production%';
SELECT network_devices.device_name, locations.city FROM network_devices JOIN locations ON network_devices.location_id = locations.id WHERE locations.country = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM network_services WHERE service_type = 'Firewall';
